Text:
I thought it would be easier to stick with one format and let people convert themselves.
Please let me know how you get on as I am brand new at this. Cheers
Any comments welcome as this is my first go at creating a torrent. Cheers.
Thanks !. Too bad, no seeders, 150 leechers, their way to say thank you

Brilliant!! Like "hematitec" wrote, EPUBs only (thank you!) and, best of all, separate files so that you don't have to wait till the end of the download to get the books you wanted. Thank God you are not a .RAR maniac. Keep on the good work; I will keep seeding.
just starting to dl now - thanks for the ul!  Muchos awesomes ;-D

This was awesome! great selection of books you have here! and most are in awesome condition and look amazing on an e-reader! thanks again! i appreciate it a lot! For a first torrent you definitely did a pretty damn good job! high five to that one mate!
